PROJECT.NAME: BGE HiC Course
PROJECT.TITLE: BGE Task 7.2 Lab course in advanced HiC methodology
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: The HiC course took place on June 9-14, 2024 at BMC Uppsala. AIM: To deliver an open, sustainable training in laboratory preparation of Hi-C libraries for reference genome sequencing of non-model organisms for BGE partner sequencing centers. Organizers: Biodiversity Genomics Europe (BGE) consortium & SciLifeLab.
